scripts.build-xpi: npm run build && web-ext build -s dist/ --overwrite-dest && mv web-ext-artifacts/netizens_association_browser_extension-0.0.1.{zip,xpi}
scripts.build-zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../picket.zip * && cd -
scripts.integration-test: NODE_ENV=test npm run build && mocha "integrationTest/**/*.spec.js" --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require testSetup.js --timeout 10000
scripts.webstore-upload: npm run build-zip && webstore upload --source picket.zip --extension-id $WEBSTORE_EXTENSION_ID --client-id $WEBSTORE_CLIENT_ID --client-secret $WEBSTORE_CLIENT_SECRET --refresh-token $WEBSTORE_REFRESH_TOKEN
